ProductInfo.Features:
Image sensor: Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD. Signal system: NTSC standard
Horizontal resolution: 700TV lines. Camera lens: 5-100mm varifocal
Can be mounted on the wall or ceiling
Connection type: BNC video & 2.1 mm center positive power plugs
Package includes: 1 x box camera (body only), 1 x universal camera bracket, 1 x 5-100mm varifocal lens, 1 x 12V DC power supply, 1 x video power cable and 1 x security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL Box Security Camera Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD Varifocal Zoom Home CCTV High Resolution with Power Supply, 5-100mm Zoom Lens, Metal Bracket and Cable SC70 CSU
